channel.title: Week Two on Xtern Bootcamp 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Week Two on Xtern Bootcamp 2018

item.title: Day 5: Intro to React
item.description: Monday, May 21, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 5, Part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | [Day 4, Part 1]() Topics DOM Manipulation contenteditable - MDN documentation keypress events ES2015+ (ES6+) Inheritance (with the ES2015 class syntax; it’s still prototypal inheritance though) - ES2015 classes on Babel Modules (import/export) - ES2015 modules on Babel React Imperative vs. Declarative Components JSX - Docs: Introducing JSX Props - Docs: Components and Props State - Docs: State and Lifecycle create-react-app Examples DOM Manipulation contentEditable is a property that, like the name suggests, allows the content of an HTML element to be edited through user interaction with the DOM (similar to a text input field).
